item.title: Git
item.description: Reference https://www.atlassian.com/git/tutorials/big-repositories How to use multiple account on github Generate SHA 1 2 $ ssh-keygen -t rsa $ ssh-keygen -t example 1 2 $ ~/.ssh/id_rsa $ ~/.ssh/example Create config 1 $ vim config ~/.ssh/config 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 Host github.com HostName github.com User git IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa Host github.com-work_user1 HostName github.
